question: Which of the following paintings is also known as “Palagai Padam”?
explanation: Thanjavur painting is a classical South Indian Painting. This type of painting is created on wood and canvas and hence it is known as “Palagai Padam” in local language. These paintings are created using semi precious stones, glass pieces and 22 carat gold foli, which is used to fill the surroundings.These paintings are normally framed, to protect them from pests.
